post.body: Sneak Peek of Season Five of Lost http://bit.ly/RThO
WGA says producers are not fulfilling contract - says studios not paying for work used on the Internet. http://bit.ly/pODE
Twilight stars Robert Pattinson and Kristin Stewart reportedly getting a big salary boost for sequels after $70m opening http://bit.ly/XwaO
SAG Strike: The Screen Actors Guild said Saturday it will ask its members to authorize a strike. http://bit.ly/n6VZ
What do the actors smoke on Mad Men? - Ecstacy herbal cigarettes, which are tobacco- and nicotine-free. http://twurl.nl/f6562r
Hillary Duff is getting her own NBC television show but it is not yet known what the show will be about. http://bit.ly/jLsI
Sesame Street sets up channels on Hulu and YouTube and downloads on iTunes. However, first 10 seasons will not go online http://bit.ly/161R
Fans irritated at CBS for suddenly removing full-length episodes of Eleventh Hour and The Mentalist. http://twurl.nl/udeg5n
Tom Hanks has a new haircut for the Angels and Demons movie. That's a relief. Film comes out May 15, 2009. http://twurl.nl/8d1b7z
Sony and Paramount are now in talks to finance Steven Spielberg's pet project Tintin. http://twurl.nl/jqru0t
FearNet has compressed a some horror films including Hostel and Evil Dead 2 into 66.6 seconds. http://twurl.nl/m7wd31 via http://is.gd/58oV
Christopher Nolan may not make 3rd Batman film. He says, "How many good third movies in a franchise can people name?" http://twurl.nl/71nhug
Linday Lohan booted from Ugly Betty - will only be in 4 episodes instead of 6. Word is she was a big pain on the set http://twurl.nl/ff783q
NBC Universal wants to sell Rogue Pictures (Shaun of the Dead) - a possible buyer could be Relativity Media. http://twurl.nl/2n3zyb
Terrence Howard is shocked he's being replaced in Iron Man 2 by Don Cheadle. "It was the surprise of a lifetime" http://twurl.nl/p4h8np
National Federation of the Blind says "Blindness" film contains "outrageous" and inaccurate portrayal of blind people http://twurl.nl/f6ub62
Paramount cuts deal with Marvel to distribute next 5 Marvel films - includes Thor, Captain America and The Avengers http://twurl.nl/dla8u7
MTV will be dropping its flagship US show Total Request Live in November. The show lasted on the air for 10 years. http://twurl.nl/5pimg2
Nikki Finke says today's stock market plunge will impact Hollywood. http://twurl.nl/z6phse The DOW fell 500+ points. http://twurl.nl/fpa8gb
Screenwriter Aaron Sorkin (The West Wing, Charlie Wilson's War) is working on a movie about the founders of Facebook http://twurl.nl/hps1zv
The Mentalist sees good ratings in his future - 18+ million viewers this past week. http://bit.ly/3fM5ue
Catherine Hardwicke will not be directing the Twilight sequel despite Twilight's big box office opening. http://bit.ly/xTnM
Dark Knight sells 3 million blu-ray discs and DVDs on first day - on track to be bestselling home movie of 2008. http://bit.ly/dMlW
The Screen Actors Guild plans to send strike authorization ballots to more than 100,000 union members on Jan. 2, http://bit.ly/LCnH
Hollywood is still reeling from NBC's announcement that Leno won't be leaving the peacock network when his contract ends. http://bit.ly/wesA
An animated fantasy film named Delgo set a record for the least-attended film ever to open on over 2,000 screens. http://bit.ly/OaOy
